channel.title: Inregards to the shooting of the 2 police by the black
channel.description: In my life, I've fucked up at least 17 cops. I say at least 17 because they confirmed it with ID etc...others who claimed to be cops that didn't make it as far as producing ID I cannot speak for. Well...five were in uniform so that was easy to figure out BUT, it was the typical "I'm going to fuck you up and I can get away with it cuz I'm" the filth. The only reason we heard about the 2 cops was because they couldn't lie about it. You fuck up a pig or a group of pigs; they will never be honest about it. It will never be one guy fucked up four pigs. It will always be a group ambushed them etc.. Do not worry about defending yourself. Some cop fucks with you, put him in a coma, you will never hear about it. They will not speak to media, they will not tell other cops. Cops continue to be because people allow it. I don't know what would make any person believe some other person has any privilege to abuse them, but whatever it is they do not. If you're not in the mood to tolerate some cop and his BS, FUCK HIM UP, you'll be just fine. Unless you're being legit arrested and your name has been called in, don't allow some pig to power trip, there's nothing in it for you. Sauce
